meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4376.

div.div:
2003 Back to School Week game 1.
Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Aaron Sauter, a sixth-grader from New Hope, Pennsylvania
Jake Logan, from Fort Washington, Maryland
Mariah Black, from Canal Winchester, Ohio

tr.td: BODIES OF WATER
THE NAME GAME
"R" MOVIES
AT THE BEACH
DRESSING UP
HOMOPHONES
